original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁upādān aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁no upādān o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁kiles aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁no kiles o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
